channel.title: Blogs on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on My blog

item.title: Let's talk about awesomeness of ggplot2
item.description: I was asked recently how to utilize ggplot2 as it has been my most used graphical tool for all my data analysis projects. So I thought my first blog would introduce this cool graphical tool. ggplot2 ggplot2 is such a powerful R package for visualization. I personally admire the clarity and aesthetic of the plots. It was created by Hadley Wickham in 2005. It is one of the best maintained R packages.
